FAQ / Wave 8 / Stratagems /
View On Teletraan1.net

It's As Good As Used!

  1. What if I only have 1 Upgrade to reveal? [Source: Aequitas]
    Then you cannot use this ability, you need a minimum of 2 Upgrades.
  2. What if I reveal Turbo Boosters and Grenade Launcher, and my only car is in bot mode. Can my opponent choose the Turbo Boosters? [Source: Aequitas]
    Yes. Your quite please opponent may choose Turbo Boosters, which can't play and remains in your hand.
